channel.title: vim on sytranvn.dev
channel.description: Recent content in vim on sytranvn.dev

item.title: Nvim External Commands
item.description: :!{cmd} Execute cmd, display output :r !{cmd} Execute cmd, insert output to current current cursor position :w !{cmd} Pipe current buffer to cmd :.!{cmd} Execute cmd, replace current line with output :%!{cmd} Execute cmd, replace entire buffer with output :<','>!{cmd} Execute cmd, replace current selection output
